quiz.title: Google Cloud Platform Workflow Automation and Data Management Quiz

questions.questionText: A company wants to improve productivity and decides to programmatically schedule and monitor workflows. What tool can you use to automate your workflows?
questions.explanation: Cloud Composer is a fully managed workflow orchestration service built on Apache Airflow. It is designed to automate, schedule, and monitor workflows.

questions.questionText: A company collects large amounts of data that is useful for improving business operations. The collected data is already clean and is in a format that is suitable for further analysis. The company uses Google Cloud BigQuery as a data warehouse. What approach will you recommend to move this data to BigQuery?
options: A. Implement Extract, Transform, and Load (ETL) pipelines using tools like Dataflow.
B. Directly load the data using an Extract and Load approach (EL).
C. Split the data into smaller files and then move to Google Cloud.
D. Do transformation using Extract, Load & Transform (ELT).
questions.explanation: Since the data is already clean and formatted, the most straightforward and efficient approach is to use an Extract and Load (EL) method to move it directly to BigQuery.
